headline: Women Earning Over $150K Per Year Could Be Deckers’ Secret Weapon
summary: TD Cowen's survey shows women earning $150K per year have an 18 percent brand preference for Hoka in running shoes, behind Nike and ahead of On.

headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Deckers After Its 51% Slide in 2025?
summary: If you’re wondering what to do with your Deckers Outdoor shares after this wild ride, you’re not alone. The stock has seen a roller-coaster year, down 51.5% year-to-date and off 16.2% in just the last month. But if you zoom out, the bigger picture is striking: over five years, Deckers has returned 138.7%, and it’s still up an impressive 65% over three years. The past week has been relatively stable, with a modest gain of 1.3%, suggesting some investors think most of the bad news is baked...
